name: Docker
description: Docker is an open-source project for automating the deployment of applications as portable, self-sufficient containers.

alerts.alert: If the LXC is created Privileged, the script will automatically set up USB passthrough.
Run Compose V2 by replacing the hyphen (-) with a space, using `docker compose`, instead of `docker-compose`.
Options to Install Portainer and/or Docker Compose V2
